content.text: *It can be used in various grammatical constructions; as an adjective, to form the passive voice or to form a verb tense. In this unit, we are going to concentrate on the past participle to form the present perfect.

content.text: We use the present prefect to indicate a link between the present and the past, to talk about past actions or events that started in the past but have a relevance or impact into the present. Check the following examples about the present prefect tense
content.name: Qpgb

content.class: bg-white p-10 rounded-lg border-slate-500 border-4 my-1
